description: The Rock: This is one of the greatest scenes of Chris Ward'scareer, featuring a two way, a solo, another two way, and finally athree way--all shot on a mountain top in the Egyptian desert (Ok, itwas out side of Palm Springs--but a desert is a desert!). MichaelSoldier (in his screen debut) and Jeff Allen shine in an all oral scenethat features outdoor shooting at its best, Michael services headarchaeologist Jeff Allen's hairy chest, stunning abs, and engorgedcock. Cum has never looked so good!2
title: Raiders of the Lost Arse
